thread.title: Atul Wassan hails McCullum for naming Cairns in spot-fixing
thread.title_full: Atul Wassan hails McCullum for naming Cairns in spot-fixing

title: Atul Wassan hails McCullum for naming Cairns in spot-fixing
text: Atul Wassan hails McCullum for naming Cairns in spot-fixing Friday, 16 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) Former Indian cricketer Atul Wassan has lavished praise on New Zealand skipper Brendon McCullum for revealing his former teammate Chris Cairns' name in spot-fixing before the London Court.
